comment: Taylor Swift endorsing Democrat is one thing, but to come out at the AMAs and diss all Republicans/Conservatives, and Trump. Called us Evil. You burned half your base, if not more.

# ::snt Taylor Swift endorsing Democrat is one thing, but to come out at the AMAs and diss all Republicans/Conservatives, and Trump. Called us Evil. You burned half your base, if not more.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (c / contrast-01

                  :ARG0 (p / person

                              :op2 "Swift"))
                  :ARG1 (p2 / political-party

            :ARG2 (a / and

                                    :op1 "American"

                  :op2 (d / diss-01
                        :ARG0 p
                        :ARG1 (a2 / and
                              :op1 (p3 / person
                                    :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                                          :ARG1 (p4 / political-party
                                                :name (n4 / name
                                                      :op1 "Republican"
                                                      :op2 "Party"))))
                              :op2 (p5 / person
                                    :ARG0-of (h2 / have-org-role-91
                                          :ARG1 (c3 / conservative)))
                              :op3 (p6 / person
                                    :name (n5 / name
                                          :op1 "Trump"))
                              :mod (a3 / all)))))
      :snt2 (c4 / call-01
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (w / we)
            :ARG2 (e3 / evil))
      :snt3 (b / burn-01
            :ARG0 y
            :ARG1 (b2 / base
                  :ARG1-of (ii / include-91
                        :ARG2 (b3 / base
                              :poss y)
                        :ARG3 (h3 / half)))
            :condition (h4 / have-polarity-91
                  :ARG2 -)
            :ARG1-of h4))
